title: [GAMEPLAY] Beast Hunter Sejuani makes a constant roaring sound for enemy team
body: There is a constant roaring sound coming from Beast Hunter Sejuani even when she is dead. If you have vision on her or her dead body you can constantly hear the sound which gets quite annoying.

replies.body:
Hey ConfusedMagic - 

Thanks for the report! 

I just loaded up with Beast Hunter Sejuani and a Brand on the enemy team (just picked a random champion). I wasn't able to repro this. I tried having Beast Hunter Sejuani die next to him, as well as dying off camera, but still in peripheral view, then scrolling onto the body and I wasn't able to get a repro. Would you have any additional information here? Is this occurring every game for you?

I've seen similar bugs with Corki (can't recall if it was base skin or Red Baron), where you can hear his flying sound constantly after he dies. Haven't been able to tell if it's still existing since I don't see Corki in games anymore.
This patch I've also had Ignite sounds persist constantly sometimes. Can't recall other details to help in reproducing.
Ahh, okay. This may be more of a global issue. ;_; :Lemme poke audio bros to see if they can look into it/maybe have an idea as to what's going on.
Also for a very long time the turret laser sounds in the nexus turrets persist after there is no one to hit
Can confirm. It's been there for most of the season.
How about Corki's gatling gun sounds? Or Zhonya's?

It was just a one off game where the whole team noticed when Sejuani was in vision that there was just a repeating "roar" sound coming from her. We particularly noticed that when the enemy Sejuani came to gank it seemed it was not normal for her to make that sound. Later in the game we realized it must of been a bug as we killed Sejuani and the roaring kept on going. Also when the body disappeared, it stopped, probably as we no longer had vision on Sejuani. 
Another point: The Sejuani's team didn't notice it - they said they couldn't hear it.
Maybe it only occurs rarely in match made games.
Gotcha! Lemme dig a bit deeper and see if I can figure out what's going on. :)
it's an old sound bug (similae to the fire nexus tower sound, same root maybe?) because I run into it when the skin wasn't live yet (I think at that time the seju wasn't using a skin)
Interesting, I should get the skin then just to tilt my opponents xD
Yah seen this happen as well
